CardData.FlavorText:
<size=200%>Y</size>ou pause in your pursuit along the faint trail left by Bilbo's captors, sensing a change in the air. It's subtle but unmistakable: someone—or something—is watching you. 
<indent=50></indent>Though alert for any movement, you spy nothing amiss in the surrounding woods. Alas, only when the twisting branches above rustle with hidden movement do you think to look up—just as huge spiders plunge down upon you in a shower of leaves!

Localization.Title: Spiders Descend!
Localization.Text: Add up to 3 Forest Spiders to open spaces in Sauron's row
